articles.title: Test cricket: Is longest format financially viable?
articles.description: As Australia and South Africa contest the World Test Championship final, BBC Sport addresses the longer format’s future financial viability.
articles.content:
For players from England, Australia and India, playing Test cricket is financially rewarding.
Ben Stokes, England's Test captain, has a central contract reportedly worth £2.47m a year with the Engla… [+2213 chars]

articles.author: James Dampney
articles.title: Cricket says same thing on South Africa star
articles.description: Controversial South African quick Kagiso Rabada has ignited a gloomy start to the World Test Championship final against Australia at Lord’s.
articles.content:
Controversial South African quick Kagiso Rabada has ignited a gloomy start to the World Test Championship final against Australia at Lord’s.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
